Package org.neo4j.kernel.internal.locker

Class GlobalFileLocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.internal.locker.Locker
      • org.neo4j.kernel.internal.locker.GlobalFileLocker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseLocker, GlobalLocker
    class GlobalFileLocker
extends Locker
    File locker that guarantee that only single channel ever will be opened and then closed file to prevent cases where lock will be released when any of the opened channels for file will be released as described in FileLock javadoc:

    On some systems, closing a channel releases all locks held by the Java virtual machine on the underlying file regardless of whether the locks were acquired via that channel or via another channel open on the same file. It is strongly recommended that, within a program, a unique channel be used to acquire all locks on any given file.

    The guarantee is achieved by tracking all locked files over all instances of GlobalFileLocker. Class guarantee visibility of locked files over multiple thread but do not guarantee atomicity of operations.

    • Method Detail

      • checkLock

        public void checkLock()
        Description copied from class: Locker
        Obtains lock on file so that we can ensure the store is not shared between different database instances

        Creates dir if necessary, creates lock file if necessary

        Please note that this lock is only valid for as long the Locker.lockFileChannel lives, so make sure the lock cannot be garbage collected as long as the lock should be valid.

        Overrides:
        checkLock in class Locker
